problem_text_cn: 如图,五角星的五个角都是顶角为36°的等腰三角形,为了画出五角星,还需要知道∠ABC的度数,∠ABC的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, the five corners of the five-pointed star are all isosceles triangles with the vertex angle N_0. In order to draw the five-pointed star, you also need to know the degree of ∠ABC, and the degree of ∠ABC is ()
raw_comment: 此题主要考查等腰三角形的性质,解题的关键是熟知等腰三角形的性质.
